articles.title: Nigeria: Headline Inflation Falls to 17.38 Percent in July - AllAfrica.com
articles.description: Headline inflation fell for the fourth consecutive months to 17.38 percent in July, 2021, representing a 0.37 percentage points when compared to 17.75 per cent recorded in the previous month of June.

articles.title: Cote d'Ivoire Starts Ebola Vaccination of Frontline Workers - AllAfrica - Top Africa News
articles.description: Cote d'Ivoire has launched Ebola vaccination of high-risk populations, including health workers and first responders in Abidjan, where an Ebola outbreak was declared on 14 August.
